name: PhyloCSF
title: PhyloCSF
summary: Phylogenetic analysis of multi-species genome sequence alignments to identify conserved protein-coding regions

inputSpec.name: alignments
inputSpec.help: Alignments to evaluate, usually generated by the MAF Stitcher app

inputSpec.name: species_set
inputSpec.help: Usually auto-detected for alignments produced by the MAF Stitcher app

inputSpec.name: frames
inputSpec.help: Search over three or six reading frames

inputSpec.name: orf
inputSpec.help: Search over ORFs within each alignment (usually with frames=3 or frames=6)

inputSpec.name: min_codons
inputSpec.help: Minimum length considered in ORF search mode (with orf != AsIs)

inputSpec.name: all_scores
inputSpec.help: Report all scores computed (with frames != 1 or orf != AsIs)

inputSpec.name: bls
inputSpec.help: Include a Branch Length Score along with PhyloCSF score in output table

inputSpec.name: anc_comp
inputSpec.help: Include an ancestral composition score along with PhyloCSF score in output table

inputSpec.name: dna
inputSpec.help: Include evaluted DNA sequence in output table

inputSpec.name: aa
inputSpec.help: Include evaluated amino acid sequence in output table
